message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  What do you think?
I think a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer, given that the money will lose value with each round. What do you say?

Okay, I understand your point about the decreasing value of money. Let's compromise - I'll take 55, and you can have 45. This way, we both get a bit more than last round, and we can finally finish this game!
